name: ListStockForOrganizationUnits
description:
List the Stock per product/stocklabel for a subset of OrganizationUnits.

The page size `Limit` has a maximum value of `1.024` for this service (unless `DownloadOverview` is `true`).

properties.name: DateTime
properties.description: View the stock on a certain moment in time

properties.name: DownloadOverview
properties.description: When specified, the response will contain an `Url` instead to download the Excel from

properties.name: IncludeZeroQuantityStock
properties.description: If specified as true, stock with a quantity of zero is also returned by this service. Defaults to false, meaning that products with a zero stock quantity will not be returned by this service.

properties.name: Query
properties.description: Filter on products, is used as input in ElasticSearch

properties.name: SplitByOrganizationUnit
properties.description: The stock will (not) be grouped by OrganizationUnit
